authorReco.reco

Class AuthorRecognizerAbstractClass

  • java.lang.Object
    • authorReco.reco.AuthorRecognizerAbstractClass
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AuthorRecognizer1, BaselineAuthorRecognizer, UnknownAuthorRecognizer1

    public abstract class AuthorRecognizerAbstractClass
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract class AuthorRecognizerAbstractClass: abstract class that every author recognition system has to extend.
    Author:
    N. Hernandez and S. Quiniou (2017)

    • Field Summary

      Fields

      The common vocabulary associated to the language models.

    • Method Detail

      • loadVocabularyFile

        public void loadVocabularyFile(java.lang.String vocabFile)
        Method setting the vocabulary, from a given file path.
        Parameters:
        vocabFile - the file path of the file containing the common vocabulary for all the language models used in the recognition system.

      • loadAuthorConfigurationFile

        public void loadAuthorConfigurationFile(java.lang.String configFile)
        Method setting the configuration file, from a configuration file path.
        Parameters:
        configFile - the file path of the configuration file containing the information on the language models (author, name and file path).

      • recognizeAuthorSentence

        public abstract java.lang.String recognizeAuthorSentence(java.lang.String sentence)
        Method recognizing and returning the author of the given sentence (the unknown author can also be picked up).
        Parameters:
        sentence - the sentence whose author is to recognize.
        Returns:
        the author of the sentence as recognized by the recognition system.

      • recognizeFileLanguage

        public void recognizeFileLanguage(java.lang.String testSentenceFilePath,
                                  java.lang.String hypAuthorFilePath)
        Method processing the sentences of a given reference file (one per line), and writing the hypothesis author of each sentence in another file.
        Parameters:
        testSentenceFilePath - the reference file containing the sentences whose author is to recognize.
        hypAuthorFilePath - the hypothesis file of authors recognized by the recognition system.
